thread.title: Kid, Family-Friendly New Year's Celebrations Dec. 28, 31
thread.title_full: Kid, Family-Friendly New Year's Celebrations Dec. 28, 31

author: Journal Staff
title: Kid, Family-Friendly New Year's Celebrations Dec. 28, 31
text:
Park Ridge and Des Plaines families who want to celebrate the new year, but wish to avoid staying up late or leaving their communities, are invited to register for earlier activities.
Family New Year’s Eve, sponsored by the Des Plaines Park District, will be held at Prairie Lakes Park Community Center on Tuesday, Dec. 31 from 2 to 4:30 p.m. There will be games, snacks, inflatables, and a professional DJ playing music. For adults (18 and older) admission is free when accompanied by a child. A fee will be charged for the child.
New Year’s Eve Around The World will be held in Park Ridge on Saturday, Dec. 28 at Maine Park Leisure Center from 10:30 a.m. to noon. A fee will be charged.
Participants will be able to explore cultural traditions, make crafts, eat snacks and sip on drinks all of which are inspired by global favorites. There will also be games and entertainment. The celebration will end with noise makers, hats, beads and a balloon drop.
